scripts.db:migration:run: node scripts/migrationSetup.js && sequelize db:migrate && node scripts/migrationTeardown.js
scripts.db:seeder:run: node scripts/migrationSetup.js && sequelize db:seed:all && node scripts/migrationTeardown.js
scripts.db:migration:undo: node scripts/migrationSetup.js && sequelize db:migrate:undo && node scripts/migrationTeardown.js
scripts.db:seeder:undo: node scripts/migrationSetup.js && sequelize db:seed:undo && node scripts/migrationTeardown.js
